contribution.score_description: Your total contribution is the combination of your other contributions.
contribution.score_description_details: It determines how much Trust credits you earn for making governance decisions, and also increases your share of the Harvest, how many Seeds you earn through participation.

community-building.score_description: You earn points when someone you invited evolves to a Resident or Citizen, or when an organisation you invited evolves to a "Regenerative Organisation".
community-building.score_description_details: The gauge is in part how many total points you've earned and how many of them were earned in the last 3 moons. Therefore, no matter when you start, you receive the highest points for the most recent efforts.

reputation.score_description: Your reputation is a multiplier of your other contributions, used when calculating your total contribution.
reputation.score_description_details: Earn reputation by participating in the forum, getting vouched for, inviting new Residents or Citizens, and more. If your reputation is 0, your total contribution is 0 as well.

planted.score_description: Planted Seeds are similar to a savings account. They are locked out of circulation, but increase your transaction capacity.
planted.score_description_details: Planting Seeds is the easiest way to earn a return on Seeds that you're not spending. This is also how you get "free" transactions.

transaction.score_description: This gauge is what makes SEEDS "better than free". The more transactions you have, the higher your Transaction Contribution will be and the more rewards you earn.
transaction.score_description_details: The higher the reputation of the Organisation you're buying from, the more points you earn. You only earn points when buying from Regenerative Organisations, Residents and Citizens.

steps.footnote: Almost everything you do in SEEDS can earn you Total Points. Position indicates how those points compare to your peers on a scale from 0 to 99.
